name: Pillman
description:
It was always kind of weird that Pacman was just guzzlin down pills

I mean, like, I know the original pacman game didn't exactly go into details on what the white dots were but they really seemed like pills to me. Anyway, here's my pacman clone...

Features
  • Randomly generated mazes - It's a whole new experience every time!
  • (It is still mazes every time, though, so not that new of an experience)
  • Click to Move controls
  • Other than that, it's pretty much just pacman!
  • Press Q to stop worrying and learn to love the pill
  • Press R to restart
